484:1: atha khalu bhagavān śākyamunistathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha utthāya tasmāddharmāsanāt sarvāṃstān bodhisattvāan piṇḍīkṛtya dakṣiṇena pāṇinā ṛddhayabhisaṃskārapariniṣpannena dakṣiṇahasteṣvadhyālambya tasyāṃ velāyāmetadavocat-imāmahaṃ kulaputrā asaṃkhyeyakalpakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrasamudānītāmanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ yuṣmākaṃ haste parindāmi anuparindāmi nikṣipāmi upanikṣipāmi|
484:4: dvaitīyakamapi traitīyakamapi bhagavān sarvāvantaṃ bodhisattvagaṇaṃ dakṣiṇena pāṇināadhyālambyaitadavocat-imāmahaṃ kulaputrā asaṃkhyeyakalpakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrasamudānītāmanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ yuṣmākaṃ haste parindāmi anuparindāmi nikṣipāmi upanikṣipami|
484:5: yuṣmābhiḥ kulaputra udgrahītavyā dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā deśayitavyā prakāśayitavyā|
484:7: amātsaryo'haṃ kulaputrā aparigṛhītacitto viśārado buddhajñānasya dātā,
484:11: amatsaribhirbhūtvemaṃ tathāgatajñānadarśanaṃ mahopāyakauśalyamāgatānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ ca ayaṃ dharmaparyāyaḥ saṃśrāvayitavyaḥ|
484:12: ye ca aśrāddhāḥ sattvāste'smin dharmaparyāye samādāpayitavyāḥ|
484:13: evaṃ yuṣmābhiḥ kulaputrāstathāgatānāṃ pratikāraḥ kṛto bhaviṣyati||
484:14: evamuktāste bodhisattva mahāsattva bhagavatā śākyamuninā tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena mahatā prītiprāmodyena sphutā abhūvan|
484:15: mahacca gauravamutpādya yena bhagavān śākyamunistathāgato'rhana samyaksaṃbuddhastenāvanatakāyāḥ praṇatakāyāḥ saṃnatakāyāḥ śirāṃsyavanāmya añjaliṃ pragṛhya sarva ekasvaranirghoṣeṇa bhagavantaṃ śākyamuniṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhametadūcuḥ- tathā bhagavan kariṣyāmo yathā tathāgata ājñāpayati|
484:20: traitīyakamapi sa sarvāvān bodhisattvagaṇa ekasvaranirghoṣeṇa evaṃ bhāṣate sma-alpotsuko bhagavān bhavatu yathāsukhavihārī|
484:21: tathā bhagavan kariṣyāmo yathā tathāgata ājñāpayati|
484:23: atha khalu bhagavān śākyamunistathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sarvāṃstāṃstathāgatānarhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhānanyebhyo lokadhātubhyaḥ samāgatān visarjayati sma|
484:24: yathāsukhavihāraṃ ca teṣāṃ tathāgatānāmārocayati sma-yathāsukhaṃ tathāgatā viharantvarhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā iti|
484:25: taṃ ca tasya bhagavataḥ prabhūtaratnasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya ratnastūpaṃ yathābhūmau sthāpayāmāsa|
484:28: te cāprameyā asaṃkhyeyāstathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā anyalokadhātvāgatā ratnavṛkṣamūleṣu siṃhāsanopaviṣṭāḥ,
484:29: prabhutaratnaśca tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sa ca sarvāvān bodhisattvagaṇaḥ,
484:30: te ca viśiṣṭacāritrapramukhā aprameyā asaṃkhyeyā bodhisattva mahāsattvā ye pṛthivīvivarebhyo'bhyudgatāḥ,
484:31: te ca mahāśrāvakāḥ tāśca catasraḥ parṣadaḥ,
484:33: iti śrīsaddharmapuṇḍarīke dharmaparyāye'nuparīndanāparivarto nāma saptaviṃśatimaḥ samāptaḥ||
484:35: ye dharmā hetuprabhavā hetuṃ teṣāṃ tathāgato hyavadat|
484:36: teṣāṃ ca yo nirodha evaṃ vādī mahāśramaṇaḥ||
